languages.text: "Считаю эту меру неоправданно мягкой, но оспаривать не имею права". {n}Маршал прикладывает кулак к груди и церемониально произносит:{/n} "Ибо таков приговор".
"I consider this measure unduly lenient, but I have no right to protest your decision." {n}The Marshal brings a closed fist to his chest and adds solemnly,{/n} "For your judgement is final."
languages.original_text: "Считаю эту меру неоправданно мягкой, но оспаривать не имею права". {n}Маршал прикладывает кулак к груди и церемониально произносит:{/n} "Ибо таков приговор".

traits.locale_text: "I consider this measure unduly lenient, but I have no right to protest your decision." {n}The Marshal brings a closed fist to his chest and adds solemnly,{/n} "For your judgement is final."
"I consider this measure unduly lenient, but I have no right to protest your decision." {n}The Marshal brings a closed fist to his chest and adds solemnly,{/n} "For your judgement is final."
"I consider this measure unduly lenient, but I have no right to protest your decision." {n}The Marshal brings a closed fist to his chest and adds solemnly,{/n} "For your judgement is final."

"I consider this measure unduly lenient, but I have no right to protest your decision." {n}The Marshal brings a closed fist to his chest and adds solemnly,{/n} "For your judgement is final."

languages.text: "Ich betrachte diese Maßnahme als zu milde, habe aber nicht das Recht, gegen Eure Entscheidung zu protestieren." {n}Der Marschall legt seine geschlossene Faust an die Brust und fügt feierlich hinzu:{/n} "Und Euer Urteil ist endgültig.
languages.original_text: "I consider this measure unduly lenient, but I have no right to protest your decision." {n}The Marshal brings a closed fist to his chest and adds solemnly,{/n} "For your judgement is final."

traits.locale_text: "Ich betrachte diese Maßnahme als zu milde, habe aber nicht das Recht, gegen Eure Entscheidung zu protestieren." {n}Der Marschall legt seine geschlossene Faust an die Brust und fügt feierlich hinzu:{/n} "Und Euer Urteil ist endgültig.

languages.text: « Cette décision me paraît excessivement clémente, mais je n'ai aucun droit de la contester, car votre jugement est définitif, » {n}conclut-il en portant son poing fermé à sa poitrine.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I consider this measure unduly lenient, but I have no right to protest your decision." {n}The Marshal brings a closed fist to his chest and adds solemnly,{/n} "For your judgement is final."

traits.locale_text: « Cette décision me paraît excessivement clémente, mais je n'ai aucun droit de la contester, car votre jugement est définitif, » {n}conclut-il en portant son poing fermé à sa poitrine.{/n}

languages.text: “我认为这样的惩罚过于仁慈，但我无权反对你的判决。”{n}元帅握紧了一只拳头，放在胸前，郑重地开了口。{/n}“因为你的判决就是最终判决。”
languages.original_text: "I consider this measure unduly lenient, but I have no right to protest your decision." {n}The Marshal brings a closed fist to his chest and adds solemnly,{/n} "For your judgement is final."

traits.locale_text: “我认为这样的惩罚过于仁慈，但我无权反对你的判决。”{n}元帅握紧了一只拳头，放在胸前，郑重地开了口。{/n}“因为你的判决就是最终判决。”

languages.text: «Me parece que su decisión es demasiado indulgente, pero no tengo derecho a protestarla». {n}El Mariscal se lleva el puño al pecho y añade, solemne:{/n} «Su veredicto es definitivo».
languages.original_text: "I consider this measure unduly lenient, but I have no right to protest your decision." {n}The Marshal brings a closed fist to his chest and adds solemnly,{/n} "For your judgement is final."

traits.locale_text: «Me parece que su decisión es demasiado indulgente, pero no tengo derecho a protestarla». {n}El Mariscal se lleva el puño al pecho y añade, solemne:{/n} «Su veredicto es definitivo».

languages.text: 「私はこの措置を不当に寛大なものと考えますが、あなたの決定に抗議する権利はありません」{n}将帥は閉じた拳を胸に当て、厳粛にこう付け加えた。{/n}「あなたの判決は最終的なものなのです」
languages.original_text: "I consider this measure unduly lenient, but I have no right to protest your decision." {n}The Marshal brings a closed fist to his chest and adds solemnly,{/n} "For your judgement is final."

traits.locale_text: 「私はこの措置を不当に寛大なものと考えますが、あなたの決定に抗議する権利はありません」{n}将帥は閉じた拳を胸に当て、厳粛にこう付け加えた。{/n}「あなたの判決は最終的なものなのです」

languages.text: "Bu tedbiri haddinden fazla yumuşak bulsam da kararınıza karşı çıkamam." {n}Miralay, yumruğunu göğsüne götürüyor ve tok bir sesle konuşmaya devam ediyor.{/n} "Zira hükmünüz nihaidir."
languages.original_text: "I consider this measure unduly lenient, but I have no right to protest your decision." {n}The Marshal brings a closed fist to his chest and adds solemnly,{/n} "For your judgement is final."

traits.locale_text: "Bu tedbiri haddinden fazla yumuşak bulsam da kararınıza karşı çıkmaya hakkım yok." {n}Miralay yumruğunu göğsüne götürüyor ve tok bir sesle konuşmaya devam ediyor.{/n} "Zira hükmünüz nihaidir."
